name: thrifty
tagline: A personal finance tracker for spending and budgets
description: Thrifty is a self-hosted personal finance web app for tracking spending, income, and budgets. It offers charts, categories, and insights via a clean, mobile-friendly interface for managing everyday expenses.

features.title: Income Management
features.description: Track income sources and amounts to understand your complete financial picture

features.title: Charts And Insights
features.description: Visualize spending patterns with charts showing trends, category breakdowns, and comparisons

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage finances on the go with a responsive interface optimized for mobile devices

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Browse complete transaction history with search and filtering capabilities
